/************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 * @file Ex_9_8.cpp
 * @brief Exercise 9.8: What type should be used to read elements in a list of strings? To write them?
 * @date 2023-12-28
 * 
 * @copyright Copyright (c) 2023
 * 
 *************************************************************************************************************************************************************/

std::list<std::string>::const_iterator; //  to read
std::list<std::string>::iterator; // to write
